SpecOfferCloudDesc: The guard will always TRIPLE your profits instead of doubling them! You will also get the unique "Hell Clicker Tech Support” equipment and extra resources!

RateUsDesc: Your opinion is important to us! \nHelp make our game even better!

AppConsWindowText:
This app personalizes your advertising experience using Appodeal. Appodeal and Its partners may collect and process personal data such as device identifiers, location data, and other demographic and interest data to provide advertising experience tailored to you. By consenting to this improved ad experience, you'll see ads that Appodeal and its partners believe are more relevant to you. Le Itr 
By agreeing, you confirm that you are over the age of 16 and would like a personalized ad experience.
GemsForVideoDesc: Watch an ad and get 5 gems!
AdditionalSpecialOfferMsg: Get 3 new unique equipment items and a bunch of gems!
LocationsUnlockWindowText: You've unlocked new locations! Open boxes to buy all possible location areas!
FacebookLoginBonusDesc: Login to Facebook and get 50 gems!
SpecialOffersRestoreWindowDesc: We are glad, that you are back! We tracked down some of your purchases, that you've bot before uninstaling our game. We've restored everything, we were able to find!
PurchaseForAdWindowDesc: You don't have enough souls! Watch a short ad to get this upgrade for FREE!
LocationsNotOpenedWindowDesc: There are additional locations here where you can put your stuff. Fit out 9 workplaces or complete one whole puzzle to unlock new locations.
ExitWindowText: Do you really want to quit the game?
NotificationsWindowDesc: Your lovely little Pit keeps operating even when you close the app. Do you want to get notifications about important events from below?
